channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Leoni moved out with her partner but struggled to keep up with rising household running costs - so after 9 months she’s back at home to build up her savings. #CostOfLiving #Rent #Bills #FirstTimeBuyer #HouseMove #MovingHouse #BBCNews

item.title: Taiwan Premier Cho Jung-tai has called for an inquiry into the country's disaster response after Typhoon Ragasa caused a barrier lake to burst its banks, unleashing floodwaters. The death toll from the floods has risen to 15 people, and there are 17 peopl

item.title: Typhoon Ragasa has made landfall in China - about two million people were evacuated in preparation. Ragasa has weakened from super to severe typhoon status but remains highly destructive. #TyphoonRagasa #China #Typhoon #BBCNews

item.title: Aalborg airport in Denmark was temporarily closed when drones were seen in its airspace. Three other smaller airports in the southern region - Esbjerg, Sønderborg and Skrydstrup - also reported drone activity, but were not closed. #Aalborg #Denmark #Drone
